forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 3C. WSW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this evening. Partial clearing overnight. Low 37F. WSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
